data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was maintained by Francis van Dun (fvandun) as of
    version 0.11. I contacted him to continue work on this module and he
    agreed to transfer control of this module.

    The purpose is to provide extensive DHCP support classes in order
    to develop industry-class DHCP server.
